item.description:
Hello Everyone, We will "meetup" at the Visitor's center and then take (ideally)  fewer cars to the Jone's Nose Parking Lot.  Check out these sites for additional information re: Mount Greylock. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Greylock http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/mtGreylock/ We will most likely eat dinner at a "local joint" that is highly recommended by my MA native friend, Jason.

 

Ray
item.why: Beautiful Mountain in Western Mass. I will be hiking Greylock anyway with a few friends.
item.name: Hike Mount Greylock on June 4th.
